statement: A popular musical group 'Flattened' has decided to release a new album. It consists of nSongs songs. All songs are of the same length (given in seconds). A CD can store cdCapacity seconds of audio. Each pair of consecutive songs must be separated by a 1 second pause. The group director is superstitious, so the number of songs on a CD must never be divisible by 13. Given these constraints, return the smallest number of CDs required to fit the entire album.

definition.definitionVal: int leastAmountOfCDs(int nSongs, int length, int cdCapacity)

examples.note: There are at most two songs on each CD.
All the songs will fit on a single CD.
Even though all 26 songs will fit on a single CD, we must use two CDs because 26 is divisible by 13.

constraints.val: nSongs will be between 1 and 100, inclusive.
cdCapacity will be between 1 and 10000, inclusive.
length will be between 1 and cdCapacity, inclusive.
